events.name: Tempo - 3x8' @ 80–85% (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up, 3x8' tempo intervals at 80–85% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence, easy spins between. AMBER/RED fallback: VO2-lite 5x2'. Keep cadence smooth.

events.name: Endurance Z2 - 90 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Steady Z2 at 62–71% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence. Fuel early, maintain hydration. AMBER/RED fallback: shorter duration or lower intensity.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Easy spinning at 45–55% FTP, focus on recovery and smooth pedal stroke. AMBER/RED fallback: keep easy pace.

events.name: Endurance Z2 - 2h30 (OUTDOOR)
events.description: Long Z2 ride at 62–71% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence. Start fueling within 15 min, 80–100 g carbs/hr, 700–1000 mg sodium/hr, 600–900 ml fluid/hr. AMBER/RED fallback: indoor option if weather worsens.

events.name: Endurance Z2 - 90 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Steady Z2 at 62–71% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence. Fuel early, maintain hydration. AMBER/RED fallback: shorter duration or lower intensity.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Easy spinning at 45–55% FTP, focus on recovery and smooth pedal stroke. AMBER/RED fallback: keep easy pace.
